summary: All around them, the town burned. The night air was full of smoke, and the drifting red embers outnumbered the stars. Yoren...
text:
All around them, the town burned. The night air was full of smoke, and the drifting red embers outnumbered the stars. Yoren scowled. “Don’t see the need. Do what you want to the town, it’s naught to me, but leave us be. We’re no foes to you.”
Look with your eyes, Arya wanted to shout at the men below. “Can’t they see we’re no lords or knights?” she whispered.
“I don’t think they care, Arry,” Gendry whispered back.And she looked at Ser Amory’s face, the way Syrio had taught her to look, and she saw that he was right.
source: a Clash of Kings, Arya IV

tags: daily reminders why I love her
summary:
arya stark positivity post
18/01
in the midst of an assault by amory lorch, arya rescues a frightened little girl called weasel...
body:
arya stark positivity post

18/01

in the midst of an assault by amory lorch, arya rescues a frightened little girl called weasel and protects her, despite being a little girl herself and in a dangerous environment. she even tells gendry off for suggesting they leave her behind while on the run.

summary: 'Game of Thrones': The Crypts of Winterfell's Huge Role In Season 8
title: 'Game of Thrones': The Crypts of Winterfell's Huge Role In Season 8
body:
‘Game of Thrones’: The Crypts of Winterfell’s Huge Role In Season 8

Jon Snow has many dreams of the Crypts of Winterfell throughout the novel series. These dreams can be clues of what fans can expect in Season 8 based on the recent teaser trailer. “He was wandering the empty castle, searching for his father, descending into the crypts. Only this time the dream had gone further than before. When he turned he saw that the vaults were opening, one after the other.…

summary: Arya: *trying to convince Jaqen to help her kill Cersei*  Jaqen, please, you know the black cells better than anyone. Only you...
body:
Arya: *trying to convince Jaqen to help her kill Cersei*  Jaqen, please, you know the black cells better than anyone. Only you can show me the way.
Jaqen: Why the hell should I help you?
Arya: Come on, I know it didn't work out between us, but we did have a relationship.
Jaqen: We had sex twice in the hall of faces and then you dumped me. How is that a relationship?
Arya: Twice!

summary: Come Home
title: Come Home
description:
by Winteriscoming825

After killing Walder Frey. Arya felt some justice and satisfaction, but a big part of her old self was missing, it was Jon. He’s always make her feel safe and appreciated, they were both seen as the odd ones in the family. One being the bastard and the other ‘not ladylike’ as she should have been. She missed him messing up her hair and smiling at her, his eyes almost shut when he truly smiled, which was only around Arya. She knew Jon was King in the North but would he still love her the same after all these years? Would he still love her for the assassin she is?

Words: 304, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Game of Thrones (TV)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Underage
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Jon Snow, Arya Stark, Sansa Stark, Bran Stark, Daenerys Targaryen
  • Relationships: Jon Snow/Arya Stark
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, Slow Burn, maybe smut not sure

blog.name: onefail-at-atime
blog.description: Call me Bai. Midwest. Nerd. Reader. Writer. I don't know what I'm doing. I mean really, I don't.

summary: *Gendry’s thoughts during the Eastwatch episode. I still can’t believe that NOBODY in that suicide squad mentioned Arya. How...
body:
*Gendry’s thoughts during the Eastwatch episode. I still can’t believe that NOBODY in that suicide squad mentioned Arya. How rude.*

Unbelievable.

Gendry was still fuming by the time their group had made their way up from Eastwatch’s dungeon cells to the dining hall with Davos and Jon. The redheaded Wilding was assembling a team to join theirs and they would be leaving at first light. He knew that every moment between then would be unbearable because of the way Thoros grinned at him each time he managed to look in his and Beric’s direction, contemplating just how useful the two could be and if there was any way they could disappear without Jon or Davos noticing.

They sold me like cattle.

His anger would threaten to get the best of him and so, rather than say what he really wanted, he turned to find a quiet place where he could sit and drink on his own. It wasn’t until Davos and Jon both approached that he realized he would have to play nice with the men how had sold him off to the Red Priestess.

“Davos told me about what Melisandre did to you when you were Stannis’ prisoner.” Jon started, hoping to break through Gendry’s icy anger. There was something about the Baratheon lad’s temper that he couldn’t quite place. It reminded him of someone.

Gendry scoffed in return. “The blood of kings, she said. There’s no way of knowing what hells she caused because of her god and his blood magic.”

Except a part of him did know. He had heard the names that the Red Woman had whispered into the fire as leeches filled with king’s blood, his blood, had burned in the flames. He had heard Robb Stark’s name spoken, calling his death into the universe.

And he knew the name of those who had died with him. He knew her name.

Continued on Ao3

blog.name: theladymeera
blog.title: I'm So Salty I'm a Pickle
blog.description:
Daenerys was my first fave and she will be my last.

Danielle, US. Meera is the frog queen of my heart but I post more about my dragon queen Dany. Trying to be a happy person against the will of all these nihilistic men.

This is my ASOIAF/GOT side blog. My main is a-mountain-girl, my booklr is readingaway.

tags: i'm sleep deprived and that's only making me saltier
but nobody wants to read 2000 words on why people think this way and what's wrong with them
summary: I get personally offended when somebody says that neither arya or bran will marry and have kids.  Just because arya doesn't fit...
question: I get personally offended when somebody says that neither arya or bran will marry and have kids.  Just because arya doesn't fit in the traditional ladylike mold or that bran can't walk.  Have they even read the books or read any of the great analysis out there for these two.  I find it hard to believe that anybody who thinks this knows anything about these characters.
answer: Okay I dunno what I said or did (recently) to inspire this ask-statement but yeah! I mean I don’t get personally offended but it does bother me when fans claim that Arya and Bran are too broken/damaged/disabled for love. We’re going to forgo with the full rant which I wrote and made myself erase and I’ll just say that per your statement anon, people who believe that my favorite Starklings are incapable or unworthy of love are usually show-only fans and are people who need to have a deep, introspective moment to think about subjects such as patriarchy, patriarchal gender roles and how they hurt people, and ableism. Thanks for dropping by and have great day!

trail.content: Okay I dunno what I said or did (recently) to inspire this ask-statement but yeah! I mean I don’t get personally offended but it does bother me when fans claim that Arya and Bran are too broken/damaged/disabled for love. We’re going to forgo with the full rant which I wrote and made myself erase and I’ll just say that per your statement anon, people who believe that my favorite Starklings are incapable or unworthy of love are usually show-only fans and are people who need to have a deep, introspective moment to think about subjects such as patriarchy, patriarchal gender roles and how they hurt people, and ableism. Thanks for dropping by and have great day!
